mentionedBy.name: Amplitude Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Second-ranked alternative. Digital analytics platform with impressive data visualization. Self-serve product analytics helping teams analyze how and why people engage, convert, retain in real-time across devices. Serves 26,000+ companies including Expedia, Uber, Ancestry, DocuSign, Lemonade.
